@locks  @jammur 1) were not run by AOL 2) everything we do is optimized for developers 3) our layouts are responsive 4) we let you use markdown in your bio 5) github auth 6) we will respond and implement good feedback in hours 7) whyhello works on mobile 8) you have zero design options besides your picture (sorry developers MOST of you shouldn't design and you know it) 9) our error messages involve food 10) instead of sucking your services into our platform, we use links as the internet was intended. linkjuice, gonna let it loose
11) our URL flows like butter
